mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu( parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, url, target, icon, is_show, permission ) values( #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{url}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{isShow}, #{permission} )
mapper.update: update sys_menu set parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, url = #{url}, target = #{target}, icon = #{icon}, permission = #{permission} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete sys_menu where id=#{id} or parent_ids like '%,'||#{id}||',%' and id<>1
mapper.select: select a.id, a.parent_id as "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.name, a.sort, a.url, a.target, a.icon, a.is_show, a.permission, p.name as "parent.name" from sys_menu a left join sys_menu p on a.parent_id = p.id where a.id = #{id}
select id, parent_id as "parent.id", parent_ids, name, sort, url, target, icon, is_show, permission from sys_menu order by sort
